<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Update sys_sg_input.parameter_screen and sys_sg_variable.parameter_screen for compatibility with parameter sections</description>
        <name>Update input and variable for sections</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[function updateParameterRecordsForSections() {
	var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
    gr.addQuery('name', "IN", 'sys_sg_input, sys_sg_variable');
    gr.addQuery('element', 'parameter_screen');
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
		gr.setValue('mandatory', false);
		gr.setValue('read_only', false);
		gr.setWorkflow(false);
		gr.update();
	}
}

updateParameterRecordsForSections();]]></script>
